projects.title: PizzaMama Django
projects.description: Full-stack web application for managing a restaurant and pizzeria, developed using the Django framework. It includes user authentication, order management, an admin interface, and a responsive design.
features: Sistema di autenticazione completo
Gestione ordini e menu
Interfaccia admin per gestione contenuti
Design responsive e mobile-friendly
Integrazione database SQLite
Sistema di validazione form
challenges: Implementazione sistema autenticazione Django
Design responsive per tutti i dispositivi
Ottimizzazione performance database
learnings: Approfondimento framework Django
Best practices per web development
Gestione stato applicazioni web

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Portfolio personale moderno e responsive sviluppato con HTML, CSS e JavaScript vanilla. Include sezioni dinamiche, tema scuro/chiaro, animazioni smooth e caricamento dati da JSON.
features: Design moderno e responsive
Switch tema scuro/chiaro
Animazioni CSS e JavaScript
Caricamento dinamico contenuti
Navigazione smooth scroll
Ottimizzato per SEO
challenges: Architettura CSS modulare
JavaScript vanilla senza framework
Ottimizzazione performance
learnings: CSS Grid e Flexbox avanzato
JavaScript ES6+ moderno
Web performance optimization

projects._comment: THIRD PROJECT – MASTER’S THESIS: MACHINE LEARNING & DATA ANALYSIS ON HETEROGENEOUS COVID DATASET
projects.title: Relationship and Dimensionality Reduction in Heterogeneous Datasets
projects.description: Master’s thesis project focused on the application of machine learning techniques for relationship analysis and dimensionality reduction in complex and heterogeneous datasets.
features: Custom Random Forest algorithms
Bootstrap methods for validation
Advanced statistical analysis (p-values, hypothesis testing)
Interactive data visualizations
PCA-based dimensionality reduction
Complete scientific documentation
challenges: Handling complex and heterogeneous datasets
Implementing machine learning algorithms from scratch
Rigorous statistical validation
learnings: Theoretical and applied machine learning
Scientific research methodologies
Advanced statistical analysis

projects._comment: FOURTH PROJECT: MACHINE LEARNING & DATA ANALYSIS ON THE TITANIC DATASET
projects.title: Titanic Survival Prediction – Machine Learning Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive machine learning analysis to predict Titanic passenger survival. It includes exploratory data analysis, advanced feature engineering, multiple ML algorithms, ensemble methods, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard.
features: Complete exploratory data analysis
Advanced feature engineering with title extraction
Multiple ML algorithms (Random Forest, SVM, Logistic Regression)
Hyperparameter tuning with GridSearchCV
Ensemble methods and Voting Classifier
Multi-page interactive Streamlit dashboard
Stratified 10-fold cross-validation
Model interpretation and feature importance analysis
Learning curves and bias–variance analysis
Automated EDA with Sweetviz and Pandas Profiling
Direct links to Google Colab notebooks
Performance metrics: 83.79% accuracy, 0.8567 ROC-AUC
challenges: Strategic handling of missing values to avoid data leakage
Creative feature engineering based on historical domain knowledge
Bias–variance trade-off optimization for robust generalization
Seamless integration between exploratory and predictive analysis
Ensemble method optimization for improved performance
learnings: Advanced feature engineering techniques
Ensemble methods and model stacking
Cross-validation strategies for small datasets
Model interpretation and explainable AI
End-to-end ML pipeline development
Professional data science workflow
Multi-page Streamlit applications

projects._comment: GDR WEB APP PROJECT – MULTIPLAYER FANTASY ROLE-PLAYING GAME
projects.title: GDR Web App – Fantasy Role Playing Game
projects.description: Multiplayer fantasy role-playing game developed during the 'Python Programmer and Developer' training course. A complete web application that allows players to create characters, explore environments, fight enemies, and manage inventories in an immersive fantasy world.
features: Complete user authentication system
Character creation with 3 unique classes (Warrior, Mage, Rogue)
Dynamic inventory system with specialized items
3 game environments with specific modifiers (Forest, Volcano, Swamp)
Turn-based strategic combat system
Procedural missions with enemies and rewards
Character progression system with level-up mechanics
Advanced statistics dashboards for characters and inventories
Responsive Bootstrap 5 interface
Modular architecture using Flask Blueprints
Data validation with Marshmallow schemas
Complete logging system for debugging and monitoring
Virtual credits management for in-game economy
REST API for statistics and dynamic dashboards
challenges: Implementation of a balanced combat system with environmental modifiers
Management of multiplayer sessions and persistent game state
Scalable modular architecture with clear separation between business logic and presentation
Gameplay balancing across different character classes
Performance optimization for simultaneous multi-player handling
Refactoring from individual functions to class-based organization for maintainability
learnings: Full-stack web development with Flask and MVC architecture
Game design and gameplay mechanics balancing
Collaborative development using Git workflows and code reviews
Database modeling for complex gaming applications
UI/UX design for interactive web applications
Clean code principles and design patterns
Testing and debugging multi-user web applications
Code refactoring and organizational patterns
technical_highlights: Robust data validation system using Marshmallow
Real-time dashboards with REST APIs and AJAX

projects._comment: GALAXY RUNNER – 3D SPACE GAME BUILT WITH KIVY
projects.title: Galaxy Runner – 3D Space Tunnel Game
projects.description: High-speed 3D space runner game built with Kivy. Features include dynamic procedural track generation, custom mathematical perspective transformations for realistic visuals, and multi-platform input support for desktop and mobile devices, delivering an immersive tunnel effect.
features: Custom 3D perspective engine based on vanishing point mathematics
Smooth cross-platform controls (desktop keyboard + mobile touch)
Dynamic procedural track generation with intelligent obstacle placement
Complete audio system with background music and sound effects
Integrated game states with start screen and game over functionality
Accurate collision detection between player ship and procedural obstacles
Responsive user interface with adaptive layout for different resolutions
Modular architecture with clear separation of responsibilities
Distance-based scoring system with real-time updates
Optimized performance at 60 FPS with efficient rendering
Complete documentation with best practices and API reference
Italian localized version for educational purposes
Custom typography with space-themed fonts
Advanced mathematical transformation system for 3D tunnel effect
challenges: Implementing 3D perspective transformation algorithms from scratch using custom mathematics
Performance optimization to achieve 60 FPS rendering with multiple simultaneous objects
Designing a unified cross-platform input system for desktop and mobile
Balancing gameplay mechanics for progressive difficulty and player engagement
Scalable modular architecture with clean separation of responsibilities
Managing multiple coordinate systems (world, screen, perspective)
Implementing precise collision detection using vertex-based algorithms
Writing complete technical documentation for mathematical transformations
learnings: Advanced 3D mathematics and perspective transformation algorithms
Mastery of the Kivy framework for cross-platform game development
Game engine architecture design with modular components
Performance optimization techniques for real-time rendering
Cross-platform input handling and responsive design patterns
Professional documentation writing and API design
Git workflow management with feature branches
Code localization strategies for educational purposes
Audio system integration and state-based sound management
Mathematical modeling for realistic 3D perspective effects
technical_highlights: ~2000+ lines of Python code with complete documentation
Custom 3D mathematical algorithms for realistic perspective
Consistent 60 FPS performance with efficient rendering
Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS)
Professional documentation with full API reference

projects._comment: MRBEAT – PROFESSIONAL DRUM MACHINE BUILT WITH KIVY
projects.title: MrBeat – Professional Drum Machine and Beat Sequencer
projects.description: Professional drum machine for music production built with Kivy and pygame. Features include 16-step multi-track sequencing, a real-time audio engine with safe threading, a professional drum machine interface, and support for extensible sound kits with high-quality 16-bit audio processing.
features: Professional pygame audio engine with 44.1kHz 16-bit processing
Synchronized multi-track sequencing with sample-accurate timing
Real-time BPM control (80–160) with seamless updates during playback
Extensible sound kit system with 8 professional drum tracks
Safe threading for real-time audio processing without glitches or interruptions
Professional drum machine interface with synchronized visual feedback
16-step pattern programming with real-time edits during playback
One-shot audio system for immediate triggering and live performance
Modular architecture with clear separation between audio engine and UI
Complete technical documentation with professional API reference
Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, macOS, Linux)
Professional code quality with type hints and robust error handling
Visual step indicator synchronized with the audio sequencer
Multi-track mixing system with overflow protection
projects.role: Audio Software Engineer and Music Technology Developer
challenges: Complete migration from deprecated audiostream to modern pygame while maintaining compatibility
Implementing safe threading for real-time audio without race conditions
Optimizing audio latency below 10ms for professional music performance
Designing a scalable modular architecture for custom sound kits
Achieving sample-accurate synchronization between UI visual feedback and audio sequencer
Efficient memory management for multiple audio samples
Implementing real-time pattern programming without audio interruptions
Producing complete professional documentation with detailed flowcharts
learnings: Advanced audio programming with pygame mixer and real-time processing
Safe threading and concurrency patterns for critical audio applications
Modular software architecture for scalable audio engines
Performance optimization for low-latency audio processing
Kivy framework mastery for professional music interfaces
WAV audio format handling and automatic sample rate conversion
Professional technical documentation and API design best practices
Music technology development and drum machine workflow understanding
Cross-platform audio development challenges and solutions
Professional code organization and separation of concerns patterns

components.name: Professional UI System
components.technology: Kivy responsive design with visual feedback
components.scalability: Adaptive layout for multiple screen sizes

technical_highlights: ~1500+ lines of Python code with complete professional documentation
Safe threading implemented for glitch-free real-time audio
Modular architecture with 10+ specialized files for separation of concerns
Audio performance optimized for professional music production

projects.title: Python Learning Journey
projects.description: Comprehensive collection of Python projects and exercises from the Udemy course, evolving from v1.0 to v12.0. Includes automation, web scraping, GUI applications, and API integration.
features: 12+ progressive project versions
Automation of repetitive tasks
Web scraping applications
Desktop GUIs with Tkinter/Kivy
External API integration
Detailed documentation of the learning evolution
challenges: Maintaining consistency across versions
Documenting the learning process
Progressively implementing best practices

Version control with Git
Clean code principles
